general_advisory: Before sowing, paddy seeds should be treated with Trichoderma powder formulation@10g/kg of seeds or any other seed treating chemicals like Thiram 75% @ 3 gm or Captan 50% @ 3 gm per kg of seeds procured from the Government approved agencies...

advisory: Upland rice varieties (Matures in 100-120 days) like Khandagiri, Sahabhagi Dhan, DRR-42, DRR-44, DRR-46, Mandakini, Naveen, GB-1, Bina-1, MTU-1010, Satyabhama etc. can be cultivated. Medium land rice varieties (Matures in 120-140 days) like MTU 1...

Low land rice varieties (Matures >140 days) like Pratikshya, Swarna, Swarna Sub-1, RGL-2537, MTU-1075, Mrinalini, Hashanta, Rani Dhan, CR 1009, CR 1009 Sub-1, DRR 50, Pooja, MTU-1064, CR-1018, Sarala, Durga, Pradhan Dhan, Nua Kalajeera, Nua chinik...
Before sowing, seed treatment can be done with Carbendazim 50 % WP @ 2- gram/ kg of seeds or Carboxin 37.5 % + Thiram 37.5% D.S WP or thiram 75 % WS @ 3 gm/kg of seeds
